id: A Lot of Artificial Christmas Trees Are Up to 71 Percent Off Right Now
paragraph: It’s almost time to put up the Christmas tree, and if you’re still looking for an artificial pine or Douglas fir to set up in the living room, Macy’s and Wayfair have a bunch of them available at a discount today as part of its one-day Thanksgiving sale (the name is a bit confusing to us, too). Note that in some cases the trees are actually cheaper on Amazon than Macy’s, so we cross-checked to make sure that these were the very best deals, whether you prefer a tree with or without built-in lights.
